sentences.sContent: I agree with you one hundred percent.
sentences.sContent_eng: I agree with you one hundred percent.
sentences.sCn: 我百分之百地同意你的意见。

sentences.sContent: The number of queues repaired out of the percent detected.
sentences.sContent_eng: The number of queues repaired out of the percent detected.
sentences.sCn: 修复的队列数目超过检测到的百分比。

sentences.sContent: There one percent of the people own more than fifty percent of the wealth.
sentences.sContent_eng: There one percent of the people own more than fifty percent of the wealth.
sentences.sCn: 在那里，百分之一的人却拥有百分之五十以上的财富。

synos.tran: [数]百分比，百分率；部分；百分数

phrases.pCn: 容积百分数，容量百分比；体积百分比

remMethod.val: per(每)+cent(百)→每个一百里有多少→百分之…， 也可写作per cent

words.tran: 百分率的；按百等分排列的
